poll_list.title: Ratify the Results of Grants Round 14 and Formally Request the Community Multisig to Payout Matching Allocations
poll_list.body:
We ask our Community Stewards to ratify the GR14 payout amounts as being correct, fair, and abiding to community norms, including the judgments and sanctions made by the Fraud Detection & Defense workstream.

For further info & final GR14 results, see this forum post: https://gov.gitcoin.co/t/proposal-ratify-the-results-of-grants-round-14-and-formally-request-the-community-multisig-holders-to-payout-matching-allocations/11038

Please vote FOR or AGAINST.

FOR: Ratify the round results
You ratify the results as reported by Gitcoin Holdings & the Fraud Detection & Defense workstream and request the keyholders of the community multisig to payout funds according to the GR14 final payout amounts through the non-custodial GR14 deployment contract.

AGAINST: Request further deliberation
You do not ratify the results and request keyholders of the community multi-sig wallet to delay payment until further notice.
poll_list.author: 0x894Aa5F1E45454677A8560ddE3B45Cb5C427Ef92

discourse_list.title: [Proposal] Ratify the Results of Grants Round 14 and Formally Request the Community Multisig Holders to Payout Matching Allocations

content.content: We ask our Community Stewards to ratify the GR14 payout amounts as being correct, fair, and abiding to community norms, including the judgments and sanctions made by the Fraud Detection & Defense workstream. The full list of final results & payout amounts can be found here. We would like to suggest voting on Snapshot to begin on Tuesday, July 5th in advance of payouts being made on Friday, July 15th.  Options to vote on:  Ratify the round results  You ratify the results as reported by the Public Goods Funding & Fraud Detection & Defense workstreams and request the keyholders of the community multisig to payout funds according to the GR14 final payout amounts through the non-custodial GR14 deployment contract.  Request further deliberation  You do not ratify the results and request key holders of the community multi-sig wallet to delay payment until further notice.  TLDR from the GR14 Post:   Grants Round 14 (GR14) ran from June 8-23, 2022   $4.9M will be distributed to public goods as part of the round, of which $3.2M came from the combined matching pools and $1.7M was contributed by the community.   Record-breaking community participation with over 44,000 contributors making just shy of 600,000 contributions to over 1,250 grants   GR14 featured 18 rounds:   The main round   14 Ecosystem rounds: Aurora, Celo, ENS, EthInfra, Lootverse, Mask, OpenGaming, Polygon, ProtocolLabs, Radicle, TheGraph, Unlock, ZKTech, Oakland   Three cause rounds: Climate Solutions, Advocacy and Diversity, Equity and Inclusion (DEI)     In GR14, we continued on the same main pool structure as GR12 and GR13 – in GR12, the community chose to pilot a single pool approach with a 2.5% maximum cap for the main round rather than a category-based setup and we continued this through GR13 and GR14.   FDD’s Governance Brief for an overview of sybil detection will be out soon, stay tuned. For questions, comments, or concerns on any of the above, please comment below or join the Gitcoin Discord.
grants many to support web3 project

Thanks for a clear and concise recap! Here is the Governance Brief for GR14.    GR14 Governance Brief 🌱Grants       The Fraud Detection & Defense workstream (FDD) aims to minimize the impact of fraud on our community. In this post, we highlight the quantitative data behind GR14 and the qualitative decisions made. We also describe the reasoning behind any subjective judgments along with making recommendations to the Grants Operations team and Stewards for new policy revisions to match changing circumstances.   TL:DR  Sybil Defense  Sybil attacks are way up!  Contributors - 16,073 / 44886 contributors Contribut…
Thank you for this summary! Eager to see this moved to a Snapshot vote in the next couple days so the payouts can be ready for grantees by end of next week as planned.
Thank you for getting the Governance Brief up for GR14
Hey Janine - Thanks for the write up! I am so glad to have you leading this work and largely continuing to lead the DAO  I am supportive of ratifying the results and paying these out.
Its heartening to see the level of community participation this round! You have support too.
Great to see Grants continuing to be an invaluable piece of the PG puzzle! In full support of ratification and distribution of funds to all the great projects supported this round.
Great results, all looks good and will support ratification!
Result looks great! I voted in support of its ratification.
